front.title: LDP Extensions for MPLS-TP PW OAM configuration

abstract.t: This document describes a procedure for the configuration of the pseudo wire (PW) virtual circuit connectivity verification (VCCV) Bidirectional Forwarding Detection (BFD) OAM mechanism through LDP extensions. As the other MPLS-TP PW OAM functionalities develop, the procedure may be changed to cover them.
